subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$258,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://doubleransalt.com/
